welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vellore, India! Get ready to experience the rich history and cultural charm of our city, known for its magnificent Vellore Fort and vibrant local markets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Vellore has to offer.

restaurants.address: Opp. CMC Medical College, Vellore 632001, Tamil Nadu
